title: Saving the world, one cell-phone app at a time
body: The folks at DataDyne.org just got slashdotted for their wonderful work "developing sustainable, opensource information technologies to help CDC, WHO, the American Red Cross, UNICEF, and others use information technology to collect and share health information in service to the world's most needy populations". Most of the Java cell phone apps that folks in North America see are games. But there are lots of non-games, this is a particularly wonderful one.
